person.persName: Doctor S. Thomas (Hancock County, Kentucky, blacksmith)

body.p: Hancock County, Kentucky, blacksmith. Married to Margaret Thomas. Father of William Shepherd Thomas, Sarah R. Thomas, Mary E. Thomas, Emily Thomas, and Sam Thomas. Founding member of the Western Coal Company in 1843. Blacksmith in Hancock County in 1850 and 1860.
